name: major
content:
major adjective
(IMPORTANT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 [ before noun ] more important, bigger, or more serious than others of the same type: All of her major plays have been translated into English. Sugar is a major cause of tooth decay. There are two problems with this situation, one major, one minor. Citrus fruits are a major source of vitamin C. There has been a major change in attitudes recently. The United States is a major influence in the United Nations. Compare
minor adjective (UNIMPORTANT)
